org.orgName: Seattle Precinct, King County, State of Washington

div1.p: Before Reah M. Whitehead, Justice of the peace in and for Seattle Precinct, King County, State of Washington.
THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Plaintiff, vs. F.S. Medcraf, Defendant. No. COMMITMENT UPON SENTENCE.
STATE OF WASHINGTON, County of King} ss.
TO any Constable and the Keeper of the Jail of Said County, Greeting:

Whereas, at a Justice Court, held at my office in said County, for the trial of F.S. Medcraf for the offense hereinafter stated, the said F.S. Medcraf was convicted of having on the 3rd day of May, 1915, in said County, committed the crime of practicing Dentistry without a Certificate, and upon conviction the said Court did adjudge and determine that the said F.S. Medcraf be imprisoned in the County Jail of King County, Washington, for a period of _____ days, pay a fine of Fifty Dollars 50.00 and 8.60 costs of suit, and in default of payment of said fine and costs, that he be imprisoned in the County Jail of King County, Washington, until such fine and costs are paid, at the rate of Three Dollars per day, not to exceed 19 days.

Therefore, You, the said Constable, are commanded, in the name of the people of the State of Washington, forthwith to convey and deliver thesaid F.S. Medcraf to the said Keeper; and You, the said Keeper, are hereby commanded to receive the said F.S. Medcraf unto your custody in the said Jail, and him there safely keep until said Judgement is fully satisfied, as above set forth,
